This is a collection of Shiny app templates and tutorials compiled as part of the Live Data project at Oxford University, can be re-used freely and without limitation - it is shared with the Creative Commons Zero (CC0 1.0 Universal (CC0 1.0) license license).

# What is a Shiny App

Shiny allows highly interactive applications/charts to be designed and created using the R language - meaning analysis/processing code can be re-used easily for communication and outreach.

A more sophisticates description of where Shiny is useful is forthcoming
